snippet.title: HYPERxFANTASY - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore a brutalist dystopia, slay lost souls and deconstruct mankind in this Narrative RPG!

Find out more on Steam → www.HYPERxFANTASY.com/steam


Dive into a vivid breathtaking dreamscape where reality stretches to its breaking point. You may try to save the bizarre yet relatable characters hiding in the desolate brutalist expanse on your way to uncover the shocking lie that may yet change everything.

Experience the story of hope... and inevitable Singularity.

Notice: HYPERxFANTASY is a video game that presents nuanced concepts alongside strong imagery and themes that may feel uncomfortable or disturbing to some players.
